languages.text: "Я модернизировал планетарный вокс-массив. Заставил его работать не на прометии, но на топливе из душ сервослуг. Сумма знаний, существующих в мире, покоится в варпе, и я выуживаю их оттуда. Думаешь, это грех? Я думаю, что грех — не делать этого. Отказ от варп-технологий лицемерен, он предает завет Омниссии, поручившего нам постичь и познать все, что есть в мироздании".

"I altered the planetary vox-array. I replaced promethium with fuel made from the souls of servo-servants. The sum of all knowledge that exists in the world lies in the warp, and I am extracting it. Do you think it's sacrilege? I think it's sacrilege not to do it. I think it's hypocrisy to reject warp technology, to betray the Omnissiah's commandment that we are to know and comprehend all of creation."
languages.original_text: "Я модернизировал планетарный вокс-массив. Заставил его работать не на прометии, но на топливе из душ сервослуг. Сумма знаний, существующих в мире, покоится в варпе, и я выуживаю их оттуда. Думаешь, это грех? Я думаю, что грех — не делать этого. Отказ от варп-технологий лицемерен, он предает завет Омниссии, поручившего нам постичь и познать все, что есть в мироздании".

The sum of all knowledge that exists in the world lies in the warp, and I am extracting it. You think it's a sin? I think it's a sin not to do it. It is hypocrisy to reject warp technology, it betrays the Omnissiah's commandment that we are to know and comprehend all of creation."
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: 「私は惑星のヴォクス・アレイを変えた。プロメチウムとサーヴォ・サーヴァントの魂から作られた燃料を入れ替えた。世界に存在する全ての知恵は歪みにある。そして私はそれを抽出しているのだ。これを神への冒涜だと思うか？私はそうしないことこそ冒涜だと思う。歪みの技術を使わないなど、我々は全てを知りそして理解するべきだという万機神の教えを裏切るなど、偽善だ」
languages.original_text: "I altered the planetary vox-array. I replaced promethium with fuel made from the souls of servo-servants. The sum of all knowledge that exists in the world lies in the warp, and I am extracting it. Do you think it's sacrilege? I think it's sacrilege not to do it. I think it's hypocrisy to reject warp technology, to betray the Omnissiah's commandment that we are to know and comprehend all of creation."

traits.locale_text: 「私は惑星のヴォクス・アレイを変えた。プロメチウムとサーヴォ・サーヴァントの魂から作られた燃料を入れ替えた。世界に存在する全ての知恵は歪みにある。そして私はそれを抽出しているのだ。これを神への冒涜だと思うか？私はそうしないことこそ冒涜だと思う。歪みの技術を使わないなど、我々は全てを知りそして理解するべきだという万機神の教えを裏切るなど、偽善だ」
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: “我改造了那颗行星的音阵阵列，还将仆人的灵魂制成了燃料，用它代替了钷素。宇宙中的所有知识都在亚空间之中，而我正在努力提取这些知识。你认为这是在亵渎神明吗？我认为如果不这么做，那才真的是在亵渎神明。欧姆尼塞亚要求我们知晓、理解所有的造物，因此我认为，拒绝亚空间技术是虚伪的做法，因为这违背了欧姆尼塞亚的命令。”
languages.original_text: "I altered the planetary vox-array. I replaced promethium with fuel made from the souls of servo-servants. The sum of all knowledge that exists in the world lies in the warp, and I am extracting it. Do you think it's sacrilege? I think it's sacrilege not to do it. I think it's hypocrisy to reject warp technology, to betray the Omnissiah's commandment that we are to know and comprehend all of creation."

traits.locale_text: “我改造了那颗行星的音阵阵列，还将仆人的灵魂制成了燃料，用它代替了钷素。宇宙中的所有知识都在亚空间之中，而我正在努力提取这些知识。你认为这是在亵渎神明吗？我认为如果不这么做，那才真的是在亵渎神明。欧姆尼塞亚要求我们知晓、理解所有的造物，因此我认为，拒绝亚空间技术是虚伪的做法，因为这违背了欧姆尼塞亚的命令。”
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: "Ich habe die planetare Voxmatrix geändert- Ich habe Promethium durch einen Treibstoff aus den Seelen von Servo-Dienern ersetzt. Die Summe allen Wissens der Welt liegt im Warp, und ich extrahiere sie. Haltet Ihr das für ein Sakrileg? Für mich wäre es ein Sakrileg, es nicht zu tun. Ich halte es für heuchlerisch, Warp-Technologie abzulehnen und das Gebot des Omnissiah zu brechen, dass wir die gesamte Schöpfung kennen und begreifen sollen."
languages.original_text: "I altered the planetary vox-array. I replaced promethium with fuel made from the souls of servo-servants. The sum of all knowledge that exists in the world lies in the warp, and I am extracting it. Do you think it's sacrilege? I think it's sacrilege not to do it. I think it's hypocrisy to reject warp technology, to betray the Omnissiah's commandment that we are to know and comprehend all of creation."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe die planetare Voxmatrix geändert- Ich habe Promethium durch einen Treibstoff aus den Seelen von Servo-Dienern ersetzt. Die Summe allen Wissens der Welt liegt im Warp, und ich extrahiere sie. Haltet Ihr das für ein Sakrileg? Für mich wäre es ein Sakrileg, es nicht zu tun. Ich halte es für heuchlerisch, Warp-Technologie abzulehnen und das Gebot des Omnissiah zu brechen, dass wir die gesamte Schöpfung kennen und begreifen sollen."
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: « J'ai modifié l'émetteur-vox planétaire et remplacé le prométhium par du carburant issu des âmes des servoserviteurs. La somme de toutes les connaissances de ce monde se trouve dans le Warp, et je cherche à l'en extraire. Vous considérez cela comme un sacrilège ? Moi, je pense au contraire que ce serait un sacrilège de ne pas le faire. Rejeter la technologie du Warp relève de l'hypocrisie la plus pure. Cela revient à trahir le commandement de l'Omnimessie nous exhortant à élucider les mystères de la création. »
languages.original_text: "I altered the planetary vox-array. I replaced promethium with fuel made from the souls of servo-servants. The sum of all knowledge that exists in the world lies in the warp, and I am extracting it. Do you think it's sacrilege? I think it's sacrilege not to do it. I think it's hypocrisy to reject warp technology, to betray the Omnissiah's commandment that we are to know and comprehend all of creation."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai modifié l'émetteur-vox planétaire et remplacé le prométhium par du carburant issu des âmes des servoserviteurs. La somme de toutes les connaissances de ce monde se trouve dans le Warp, et je cherche à l'en extraire. Vous considérez cela comme un sacrilège ? Moi, je pense au contraire que ce serait un sacrilège de ne pas le faire. Rejeter la technologie du Warp relève de l'hypocrisie la plus pure. Cela revient à trahir le commandement de l'Omnimessie nous exhortant à élucider les mystères de la création. »
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: «He alterado la red matriz de vocos del planeta. He sustituido el prometio por combustible elaborado a partir de almas de servosirvientes. La suma de todos los conocimientos que existen en el universo se halla en la disformidad, y la voy a extraer. ¿Lo considera un sacrilegio? Yo creo que lo sacrílego sería no hacerlo. Me parece una hipocresía rechazar la tecnología de la disformidad, traicionar el mandamiento del Omnissiah que nos exhorta a conocer y comprender toda la creación».
languages.original_text: "I altered the planetary vox-array. I replaced promethium with fuel made from the souls of servo-servants. The sum of all knowledge that exists in the world lies in the warp, and I am extracting it. Do you think it's sacrilege? I think it's sacrilege not to do it. I think it's hypocrisy to reject warp technology, to betray the Omnissiah's commandment that we are to know and comprehend all of creation."

traits.locale_text: «He alterado la red de vocos del planeta. He sustituido el prometio por combustible elaborado a partir de almas de servosirvientes. La suma de todos los conocimientos que existen en el universo se halla en la disformidad, y la voy a extraer. ¿Lo considera un sacrilegio? Yo creo que lo sacrílego sería no hacerlo. Me parece una hipocresía rechazar la tecnología de la disformidad, traicionar el mandamiento del Omnissiah que nos exhorta a conocer y comprender toda la creación».
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: "Gezegenin voks antenleriyle oynadım. Prometyumu, hizmotkârların ruhuyla yapılan yakıtla değiştirdim. Dünyada var olan tüm bilgilerin toplamı, öteboyutta mevcut. Bu bilgileri çekiyorum. Hürmetsizlik mi bu? Bence asıl bunu yapmamak hürmetsizliktir. Öteboyut teknolojisini reddetmek ikiyüzlülüktür, Hermesih'in tüm yaratımı bilmemize ve idrak etmemize dair emrine ihanettir."
languages.original_text: "I altered the planetary vox-array. I replaced promethium with fuel made from the souls of servo-servants. The sum of all knowledge that exists in the world lies in the warp, and I am extracting it. Do you think it's sacrilege? I think it's sacrilege not to do it. I think it's hypocrisy to reject warp technology, to betray the Omnissiah's commandment that we are to know and comprehend all of creation."

traits.locale_text: "Gezegensel voks antenlerini düzenledim. Prometyumu, hizmohizmetkârların ruhunun yapıldığı yakıtla değiştirdim. Dünyadaki bütün var olan bilgilerin toplamı öteboyutta mevcut ve ben de onu çekiyorum. Bunun küfür olduğunu mu düşünüyorsun? Bence asıl bunu yapmamaktır küfür. Öteboyut teknolojisini reddetmek ikiyüzlülüktür, Hermesih'in tüm yaratımı bilmemize ve idrak etmemize dair verdiği emre ihanet etmektir."
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements
